info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Thunderstorms producing heavy rainfall will impact portions of northeastern Ulster, Columbia and southeastern Greene Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lanesville to near Milton to near Philmont. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...These storms are producing locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding especially of low lying and poor drainage areas are possible. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Locations impacted include... Hudson, Catskill, Chatham, Hunter, Claverack, Woodstock, Livingston, Coxsackie, Valatie, Athens, Austerlitz, Philmont, Kinderhook, Lorenz Park, North-South Lake Campground, Claverack-Red Mills, Lanesville, Cairo, Ghent and Stockport. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 21 and 21B. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
